descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

taskListId.name: taskListId
taskListId.description: The identifier of the list, unique in the user's mailbox. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
taskListId.ai_hint: The identifier of the list, unique in the user's mailbox. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

applicationName.name: applicationName
applicationName.description: App name of the source that is sending the linked entity
applicationName.ai_hint: App name of the source that is sending the linked entity

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: dueDateTime
options.description: The date in the specified time zone that the task is to be finished

options.name: reminderDateTime
options.description: The date in the specified time zone that the task is to be reminded

options.name: status
options.description: Indicates the state or progress of the task

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: dueDateTime
options.description: The date in the specified time zone that the task is to be finished

options.name: reminderDateTime
options.description: The date in the specified time zone that the task is to be reminded

options.name: status
options.description: Indicates the state or progress of the task

options.name: title
options.description: A brief description of the task

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

title.name: title
title.description: A brief description of the task
title.ai_hint: A brief description of the task

listId.name: listId
listId.description: The identifier of the list, unique in the user's mailbox
listId.ai_hint: The identifier of the list, unique in the user's mailbox

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'linkedResource' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation IN ["create", "delete", "get", "getAll", "update"] AND resource == 'linkedResource' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskListId'
IF operation IN ["create", "delete", "get", "getAll", "update"] AND resource == 'linkedResource' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'linkedResource' THEN SHOW parameter 'displayName'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'linkedResource' THEN SHOW parameter 'applicationName'
IF resource == 'linkedResource' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'linkedResource' AND operation IN ["delete", "get", "update"] THEN SHOW parameter 'linkedResourceId'
IF resource == 'linkedResource' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'linkedResource' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'linkedResource' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskListId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation IN ["delete", "get", "getAll", "update"] AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskListId'
IF operation IN ["delete", "get", "update"] AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'displayName'
IF operation IN ["delete", "get", "update"] AND resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'listId'
IF resource == 'list' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'list' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'displayName'
